titleStmt.title: To the honorable assembly of the Commons house of Parliament, and to the committees, for grieuances of the same house. The humble petition of Edward Hopkins, William Barwell, Iohn Bellamy, Robert Vilet, Iohn Walter, Robert Wright, and other wharfingers in and neere the Cittie of London
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, Edward, fl. 1621.

notesStmt.note: Against abuses by the woodmongers in regulating use of carts--STC.
In this edition, lines 4-5 of title have: "... Robert Vilet,/ Iohn Walter, ...".
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London, England.
